string.value: #b#eTitle Challenge - PQ Mania#n\n#kYIf I achieve rank S in 5 party quests, I can get the #e#bPQ Mania#k# title? Dalair is waiting for a warrior that can earn this honorable title.

#b#eTitle Challenge - PQ Mania#n
#k 
 - Party Quest S Rank : #b#jscnt##k / 5 
 #jgaugePqS# #jperPqS# %

#b#eTitle Challenge - PQ Mania#n
#k 
 - Party Quest S Rank : #b#jscnt##k / 5 
 #jgaugePqS# #jperPqS# %

I got rank S in 5 party quests! Dalair, the representative or the God of Honor, gave me the title of '#bPQ Mania#k'. He said this title is only for a small number of explorers like me who devote themselves to party quests.

#v1142001# #e#b#t1142001##k

 - Get Rank S in 5 Party Quests

#nDo you want to test your skills to see if you're worthy of this title?

I wish you the best. There isn't a specific time limit, so whenever you think you're ready, come back and see me. Also, you should know that unless you complete or quit this quest first, you won't be able to try out for another title.
You successfully achieved rank S in 5 party quests! That's a great accomplishment.
On behalf of the God of Honor, I, Dalair, announce to the world that you are the owner of this honorable title. If you want to try out for a new title, come back and see me any time.
In order to get the PQ Mania title, you must get rank S in 5 party quests. If you don't think you can do it, why don't you quit and try for another medal?
